page.title: 09A School Day
page.content: Friday 5th. July 1985. 9.10am. We go to our Parochial Hall for assembly. 9.30am. We go to our classroom and start with a spelling test. 9.45am. Vocabulary exercise and next week's spellings. At 10.30am we go out to play until 10.45am when we return to class for maths. For the last 15 minutes we do S.R.A. At 12.00 pm we go to the cloakroom to collect our packed lunches and put them in a line on the playground until the whistle goes at 12.30 when we go into the canteen. At 1.25pm the bell goes and we file into school to do craft until 2.30pm when playtime begins. Play ends at 2.45pm. Sometimes we carry on with craft or we finish off any work left from during the week. At 4.00pm the bell goes and then we can all go home.
